# sdds-inline-tab



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                         | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disables the tab.                   | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `label`    | `label`    | The label text for the tab.         | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `selected` | `selected` | Indicates the selected/current tab. | `boolean` | `false`     |
